程序包 utt.xjy_szy.lo02_projet.game

类 Game

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
utt.xjy_szy.lo02_projet.game.Game
所有已实现的接口:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Game
extends java.lang.Thread
The Game class, extends Thread, the properties are: deck, players, answer, carpet, gameMode, gameRound, hiddenCard, ifFirstPlay, x_play, y_play
作者:
Jiayin XU, Zhengyang SU
另请参阅:
Card, Deck, Player, Carpet
